description:
Startup Fundraising is your objective! Discover the Art of Startup Pitching and Raise your Startup Capital!

Discover how your Startup can pitch for funding from Startup Investors: Prepare, Plan and Pitch your Business for Success

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

DO YOU WANT TO KNOW THE SECRETS OF GETTING YOUR STARTUP FUNDRAISING READY FOR INVESTORS?

DO YOU WANT TO AVOID THE COMMON PITFALLS AND MISTAKES MADE BY THE AVERAGE STARTUP FOUNDER?

TIME IS MONEY AND YOUR STARTUP FINANCING WON'T GET A SECOND CHANCE WITH AN INVESTOR!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

COMPLETE WITH:

  • A STARTUP BUSINESS PLAN TEMPLATE
  • A STARTUP FUNDRAISING FINANCIAL PLAN TEMPLATE
  • A DETAILED STARTUP CHECKLIST FOR INVESTOR READINESS

++++++++++++++++++++

Start Planning for your Startup Fundraising Round today!

Over 27 Lectures and nearly 2 hours of Video Lectures in which I give you detailed actionable instruction for your Startup Fundraising on what you need to do and what NOT to do!

*****************************************************************************************************

"Every Startup Founder Needs to Take This Course Sooner Rather than Later. John Colley lays it out clearly in this no-nonsense guide to getting funding from venture capitalists. Watch this course long before it is time to start looking for financial help."

Mike Palmer, 5 Stars

*******************************************************************************************************

You Will Learn...

  • How to Communicate The Startup Founder Vision
  • How to Prepare a Startup Capital Business Plan
  • How to Prepare a Startup Fundraising Financial Plan
  • What is important in Startup Pitching
  • The Detailed Art of Startup Pitching to Investors
  • What is Important to Investors who invest in Startup Capital

You will also also get a PDF SlideDeck Notes for Every Lecture!

Startup Founder - Share with your whole Startup Team and you can then teach them!

*******************************************************************************************************

"In this course, John has pulled together what can be a complex subject in a series of logical steps. He has clearly done this by virtue of his wide experience in this area, and it will be of immense help to all entrepreneurs looking to raise finance for their businesses. An excellent programme."

Jermy Devlin-Thorp, 5 Stars

*******************************************************************************************************

Bonus! - I also include a Template for your Startup Pitching Deck for you

If you are Startup Fundraising the chances are this is your first time and yet the people to whom you are pitching have done this dozens of times.

You need to overcome this Experience Deficit and ensure that when your Startup Founder gets his one shot at pitching investors you are professional, well organised and that you deliver a concise and relevant message. Its hard enough to get Startup Capital; without the proper preparation, its nearly impossible.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

I want you to learn how to close the Startup Founder Experience Deficit!

Have I missed a Startup Fundraising topic you would like covered?

Have a question relating to this Startup Fundraising course?

Message me here on Udemy!

Please don't forget to leave me a comment and a rating if you think it is appropriate to do so. :)

*******************************************************************************************************

"Whether you are just starting out with an idea or have already drafted your business plan and pitch slides this program will help immensely. I was able to fine tune my business plan and turn it into something that has a clear, concise message. Cheers for the investor checklist and sample pitch slides!"

Quizbuk, 5 Stars

*******************************************************************************************************
title: Startups Get A Winning Edge In Pitching Investors Now
